Package t10.motion.hardware

Class MotorEncoder

java.lang.Object
t10.motion.hardware.MotorEncoder
All Implemented Interfaces:
Encoder
public class MotorEncoder extends Object implements Encoder
A wrapper for an encoder, typically an odometry wheel.

  • Constructor Details

    • MotorEncoder

      public MotorEncoder(com.qualcomm.robotcore.hardware.DcMotor encoder, double encoderDiameterIn, double ticksPerRevolution)
      Creates a NovelEncoder.
      Parameters:
      encoder - The instance of the encoder from the hardware map. Yes, this is supposed to be a DcMotor.
      encoderDiameterIn - The diameter of the encoder wheel in inches.
      ticksPerRevolution - The number of ticks the encoder has per revolution of the wheel.
